headline: Frenzied Rush Of Falsehoods From the Top
text: A disinformation push to subvert the election is well underway, and it is coming straight from President Trump and his allies. The goal: to somehow stop a victory by former Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr., or, failing that, undermine his legitimacy before he can take office.
snippet: The president and his allies have united right-wing media and internet trolls with false messaging that legitimate vote counting should stop.
